text: The 2015–16 season was Atalanta Bergamasca Calcio's fifth consecutive season in Serie A after having been relegated to Serie B at the end of the 2009–10 season. The club competed only in domestic competitions, in both Serie A and the Coppa Italia. ==Players== ===Squad information=== (captain) ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="width:80px;"| Date !
